sentences.english: Nucleolus disappeared, but some plants in the early diakinesis nucleolus remains high.
sentences.chinese: 核仁消失，但有的植物在終變期的早期核仁仍然很大。

sentences.english: Nucleolus disappeared, but some plants in the early diakinesis nucleolus remains high.
sentences.chinese: 核仁消失，但有的植物在終變期的早期核仁仍然很大。

sentences.english: The nucleolus is the most obvious structure seen in the nucleus of a eucaryotic cell when viewed in the light microscope.
sentences.chinese: 核仁是在光學顯微鏡下看到細胞核中最明顯結構。

sentences.english: Tingible body macrophages are present. No prominent nucleoli or irregular nuclear profiles are appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 出現可染小體巨噬細胞，未見明顯核仁或不規則核形。

sentences.english: A few of granular cells have typical nucleolus.
sentences.chinese: 還觀察到極少的顆粒細胞具有典型的核仁。

sentences.english: If you sway grape, you could listen nucleolus sways the sound.
sentences.chinese: 如果你搖晃它，你能聽到核仁的聲音哦。

sentences.english: Under electron microscopy, the nucleolar segregation and formation of microspheres were found in the cancer cells of treated group.
sentences.chinese: 電鏡觀察治療組瘤細胞可見核仁分離和微球體形成。

sentences.english: Prominent nucleoli are seen in the nuclei of this prostatic adenocarcinoma, which is a characteristic feature.
sentences.chinese: 細胞核中可見明顯核仁是前列腺癌典型的特徵。

sentences.english: In this paper the nutrition composition of the Eriobotrya Japonia nut was analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 對枇杷核仁的營養成分進行了分析。

sentences.english: The nuclei are monomorphic with inconspicuous nucleoli.
sentences.chinese: 瘤細胞核形態單一，核仁不明顯。

sentences.english: Nucleoli (one or two per nucleus) are stained blue with hematoxylin.
sentences.chinese: 一兩個核仁被蘇木精染成藍色。

sentences.english: The chromatin is vesicular, and small nucleoli are present.
sentences.chinese: 染色質呈泡狀，可見小的核仁。

sentences.english: With the increases of follicle diameter, the diameter of nucleoli in oocytes reduced.
sentences.chinese: 隨着卵泡直徑增大，卵母細胞核仁直徑逐漸變小。

sentences.english: Cytoplast and nucleolus were blue with a little purplish red color.
sentences.chinese: 胞漿和核仁呈藍色略帶紫紅色。
